about_the_game:
Those who think they could survive the zany workplace scenarios featured in NBC's comedy The Office can soon put the absurd to the test with an all-new game based on the Emmy Award-winning television series. Immerse yourself in the hilarious environment by maneuvering through the quirkiness - whether it's a dysfunctional fax machine or idiosyncrasies of oddball co-workers — while spending a year at the Scranton branch of the Dunder Mifflin Paper Company. The frenzied fun of The Office game will have you competing to be the best paper salesperson — and playing pranks to slow down rival players who might be getting ahead!

  • In-game caricatures of cast favorites
  • Season variations at the Scranton office
  • Collectible in-game items inspired by the show
  • Computer-controlled rival competition
  • Humorous pranks

pc_requirements.minimum:
• Supported OS: Microsoft® Windows® 98SE/ME/2000/XP/Vista
  • DirectX Version: DirectX 9 (DirectX 9 or higher and 64 MB of video memory needed for Hardware Acceleration)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz
  • Graphics: Video Card with 64 MB RAM needed for Hardware Acceleration
  • Memory: 256MB RAM
  • Sound: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Hard Drive: 50MB free HD space
